EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying the Manager that an Identity had ownerships during Leaver process

Argument.name: refIdentityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is registering.

Argument.name: recipientDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is registering.

EmailTemplate.Subject: User '$refIdentityDisplayName' #if($emailSubject) $emailSubject #else Ownership #end reassignments
